Package cs

Class CSModel

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
cs.CSModel
public class CSModel extends javafx.application.Application
CSModel class extends Application to allow use of JavaFX libraries class contains all methods and main/start to load java GUI for CA
Author:
Aaron

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    changeLanguage()
    This method updates the UI with the correct language if its changed within the drop down menu
    private void
    drawPattern()
    this method checks to see if the grid contains 1's then if it does it paints square with fillRect black, this is how i get the image of my pattern
    private void
    generateAutomatonPattern(int rule)
    this method determines how the CA works and will define each cell as a 1 or 0 based on the Cellular Automata rules
    private void
    generatePattern()
    This method does the error checking for input into the text field for the CA rule, if there is no errors then it takes the user input and uses it in the generateAutomatonPattern method
